page.title: 14Sutton on Sea Primary School
page.content: { Mrs S.Carroll}is the secretary of the Parent Teacher Association.When she retires she wants to live in Spain and do nothing.She thinks children are wonderful. She joined the PTA in October 1981 Her ambition is to have lots of money so she doesn't have to work.She thinks the PTA work is quite good but she doesn't like writing things out. The PTA is a sort of club for parents and teachers.They organize things like the Car Treasure Hunt and raise money to buy things for the school.{Mr D.Jones}is the new headmaster. He likes his job here because something different happens every day.He came here because he only had 50 children at his last school in Spalding.He has been teaching for 14yrs.He enjoyed his childhood until he went to Grammar School.
